subject: Football
Agents (Business)
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Agency is the very definition of an old boys’ club, a sharp-elbowed, cutthroat world, and few women are willing to put up with the skepticism and sexism that confront them at every turn.
snippet: Agency is the very definition of an old boys’ club, a sharp-elbowed, cutthroat world, and few women are willing to put up with the skepticism and sexism that confront them at every turn.
